comment.author: 21734563@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 25725739@N00
comment._content:
The sign above the stairs, after magnifying says:

E E CAMP       Capt & A. Q. M.     U S A     : Captain and Assistant Quartermaster    United States Army

comment.author: 25725739@N00
comment._content: FOLLOW UP to above:   Did a quick search on Ancestry.com, did find a Elished E CAMP, present at Alcatraz Island, listed as a Lieutenant  and then as a Captain, and as being part of the A. Q. M  muster form dated 1863.......the handwriting is very hard to decipher....BUT it does seem as though he was REGULAR ARMY......exactly WHERE the image above was taken is not clear at the moment..
